author: sky.cactus
content: I think we need a solution to relay block witholding that can respond faster than 32/64 blocks.  Having the system go offline for 10 minutes is pretty severe and shouldn't be possible.

author: sky.cactus
content: Current best solution I have heard is MEV Boost adding the ability to be configured with a list of reporting targets where they will ship the blinded header they receive, signed by the relay.  Any of those services could also send the connected MEV Boost client a bundle that basically says, "hey, the last `m` of `n` blocks were never revealed by the relay and here is the proof (in the form of the signed headers) and MEV Boost could then stop sending to that relay until a human intervenes.

author: sky.cactus
content: Where "best" here optimizes for time-to-implementation.

author: ralexstokes
content: i agree although a good solution has to navigate a lot of subtleties

author: ralexstokes
content: i think if we go that far then we may as well just mix in a gossip layer

content: the only pushback to that mode of transport was timing against the merge
